York City Janet Kimball was driving over

couple of failed attempts to get the car
started Janet was hit by a bright light

apartment building Janet thought maybe
someone was shooting a movie Not Unusual
in New York City then she saw that the
light was coming from a saucer-shaped
craft hovering above the building

objects floating up to the saucer when

out and the saucer plunged into the East
River there were 23 eyewitnesses to this
event including one of the highest
ranking politicians in the world and
people being transported to a UFO by a
beam of light in the middle of New York
City that's not the weirdest part of the
story

York City as Linda Napolitano was
